personalInfo.name: Dev Bachani
personalInfo.bio: A computer science graduate with a background in building production applications, leveraging my skills to architect and develop backend solutions at scale in the field of agentic AI.

experience.shortDescription: Developing detection algorithms and UI flows for exercise tracking system.
keyAchievements: Developed detection algorithms for 35+ exercises using state machines, peak detection and movement thresholds
Built complete UI flows and integrated all exercises into a unified Lua system
Led most of the development, creating new exercises and improving existing ones for accuracy and consistency

experience.shortDescription: Building Agentic AI systems and contributing to cutting-edge AI development projects.
keyAchievements: Contributor to a project focused on developing Agentic AI systems
Working on scalable backend solutions for AI-powered applications
Implementing advanced AI workflows and integrations

experience.shortDescription: Revamped core app features and improved user engagement for 50,000+ users.
keyAchievements: Revamped 9 core app screens in 12 weeks, increasing engagement rates for 50,000+ users
Improved product discovery and boosted conversion rates via comprehensive sorting/filtering system
Reduced customer support response time by 30% by developing Contact Us module with form validation
Decreased bounce rates by 28% with responsive loading skeletons on 12+ pages
Achieved 75% workflow efficiency improvement by collapsing a 4-step task to 1 tap using Flutter intents

personal.name: Mathex-Editor
personal.description: A React component library for building math equation editors with automatic keyboard routing to focused input fields. Features 13 function categories including Trig, Calculus, Statistics, Probability, and Geometry with subscript/superscript mode. Packaged as a tree-shakeable npm library with full TypeScript support.

personal.name: DSA Progress Tracker
personal.description: A progress tracking tool for the A2Z DSA sheet, allowing users to mark question status, add notes, and access multiple reference links including LeetCode, GeeksforGeeks, Code360, and Hackerrank for comprehensive practice and study.

personal.name: EduScraper
personal.description: Used Beautiful Soup to extract Aptitude MCQs from IndiaBix and stored them in a JSON file. Built a React app to display/download MCQ PDFs.

personal.name: Audio Language Classification using Deep Learning
personal.description: Built a BiLSTM model in TensorFlow for spoken language classification, achieving 75.46% test accuracy, with MFCC feature extraction from 40,000+ audio samples.

personal.name: E-Commerce Platform
personal.description: Designed and built a role-based e-commerce platform (Admin, Customer) using Node.js, Express.js, React.js, Tailwind CSS, PostgreSQL. Secured with JWT, RBAC; developed REST APIs.

personal.name: Decentralized Exchange
personal.description: Full-stack decentralized exchange project with FastAPI backend and React frontend. Key features include order management, trade execution, modern UI, and SuperTokens authentication.

client.name: E-Commerce Platform
client.description: Designed and built a role-based e-commerce platform (Admin, Customer) using Node.js, Express.js, React.js, Tailwind CSS, PostgreSQL. Secured with JWT, RBAC; developed REST APIs.

client.name: Decentralized Exchange
client.description: Full-stack decentralized exchange project with FastAPI backend and React frontend. Key features include order management, trade execution, modern UI, and SuperTokens authentication.

blogs.title: Python Logging: Colored and Boxed Loggers for Readable Outputs
blogs.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to creating visually appealing and readable Python loggers with colored and boxed formatting for better debugging and monitoring.

blogs.title: Modern Node.js Backend: Build It Like a Pro
blogs.excerpt: Build a professional-grade REST API with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB using clean architecture patterns. From JWT authentication to Zod validation, learn the exact structure and conventions that make backends maintainable, secure, and production-ready.

education.institution: Institute of Technology, Nirma University, Ahmedabad
education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
